title: DONT BAN WHEN ITS NOT OUR FAULT
body: Ok soo for ex we play like a normal people and there u go life happens.. pc crush in the middle of the game.Ok you start the pc again and u continue playing but after the game ur getting a ban.... Like we want to leave the game? NO

replies.body: Like Anderi mentioned, [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) will apply a queue only after you have a history of leaves and not just 1 game.  You'll continue to accrue more low priority games, but you're more likely to get banned if these leaving is intentional.  Otherwise, leaving still causes other players a negative experience.  Your best bet is to stick to customs and troubleshoot whatever is causing you to leave.  If you're having technical issues, I'm happy to try and help just let me know!

Riot will not ban you for one time, not even for 10 leaves, instead you will get the 'Low Priority Queue' status, where you have to wait 5,10,20,30 minutes before you get placed in the queue for a few matches, usually 5 (you get a countdown as a notification after each match how many you still have until you remove the 'Low Priority Queue' status) . 

[LeaverBuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)

Your ban is highly probable for some more serious violation.
